categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Power of the Force (book)

Star Wars: The Power of the Force is a young-readers book released as part of Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi. It was written by Michael Siglain and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on September 1, 2017.

Learn about the light and dark sides of the Force, and those who are sensitive to it. This storybook spans the entire Star Wars saga and introduces readers to heroes like Luke Skywalker, Yoda, and Rey, as well as villains like Darth Vader, Darth Maul, and Kylo Ren!
